original_title: SLT-MOBITEL launches Sri Lanka’s first ‘Fibre To The Room,’ making homes smarter
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider, is set to redefine digital home experiences with the introduction of its ‘Fibre To The Room’ (FTTR) solution, making homes smarter.

FTTR is the premier solution for a full fibre home network. The facility extends fibre connectivity to every room with the latest Wi-Fi 7 coverage, creating a brand-new digital life experience for SLT-MOBITEL’s valued customers.

Home internet consumers who reside in multi-level properties and homes with dividing walls and columns, often experience Wi-Fi dead zones. Similarly, users in specific locations of their home spaces frequently experience disconnections and low speeds.
FTTR fixes these problems and provides superior internet connectivity for every room by eliminating signal interference and degradation.

SLT-MOBITEL uses an innovative, smart roaming technology to implement one network for the entire house. It ensures the roaming handover time is less than 10ms, establishing a seamless exchange anytime, anywhere. This solution supports the smooth and simultaneous efficiency of multiple IoT and other devices, paired with stable connectivity.

Additionally, Wi-Fi 7 technology offers a higher density and capacity for data transmission with optimized network control. It enables improved transmission efficiency and stability when multiple users access the Internet concurrently. Another key advantage of the FTTR solution is its ability to integrate seamlessly into existing home layouts without causing disruptions.

The FTTR for Home solution consists of the main FTTR and sub FTTRs, connected through strong, transparent, invisible self-bound optical fibre cables. These transparent fibres can be rapidly deployed to any room without damaging walls or disturbing preexisting floor plans. A selection of flexible installation options, including desktop, wall-mounted, and panel brackets, are also available to meet a variety of home decors.

Speaking on the technology, Prabhath Dahanayake, Chief Marketing Officer, SLT-MOBITEL Group said, “Fibre To The Room represents the next stage of SLT-MOBITEL’s efforts to bring our customers the best internet speeds. The solution is a means of elevating their digital home experiences. It doesn’t only improve download and upload speeds significantly. Fibre To The Room allows our customers to explore the endless wealth of online opportunities increased connectivity offers. We’re confident it will let our customers, and the nation, grow and thrive alongside the rest of the world’
